about_the_game:
🔍 Join unique puzzle adventures 🔍
Rooms of Realities offers unique and well-balanced puzzles to solve alone or with friends! Enter the mysterious levels full of logic, mechanics, precision, memory, cooperation, cipher and skill based challenges! And don’t worry if you get stuck - our smart, yet non-invasive hint system will help you get back on track.

🔍 Play solo or with your friends! 🔍
The game offers both co-op and single player modes. Solve all the puzzles by yourself or play with your friends! Work together, help each other and, what’s most important, communicate to finish the adventures.

🔍 Start your adventure in an ancient pyramid with our DEMO! 🔍
In the demo, you will start your adventure in an ancient pyramid, being able to play 2 unique levels full of puzzles! Taste the atmosphere of solving mysteries in the most exotic locations.

🔍The FULL GAME will cover 9 different levels in 3 unique environments on launch! 🔍
On the release you can expect the ancient pyramid and 2 more environments: a spooky asylum, and even an underwater mystery! Each environment holds its own story and 3 atmospheric levels to play and solve puzzles in.

🔍 Post-launch support🔍
You are right, that’s not all! We plan to further develop the game and add even more levels and stories post-launch. So, what are you waiting for? Wishlist the game and stay tuned!

Remember there is a mysterious bureau behind all the stories!
